diff_analysis.evidence: In decrypt_query, the old code split query.encrypted_msg at key_size without verifying that encrypted_msg.len() >= key_size. If the encrypted_msg was shorter than key_size, split_at would panic due to an out-of-bounds access, constituting an out-of-bounds read condition. The patch adds a length check (if key_size > query.encrypted_msg.len() { return Err(Error::InvalidInputLength); }) before split_at, preventing this.
